issues.description: Data updates between REI_SYS_01 and REI_SYS_02 are delayed by an average of 5 hours, impacting real-time customer service
Transactions from REI_SYS_01 to REI_SYS_03 are missing 10% of data packets due to loss during transmission
Customer profile data between REI_SYS_02 and REI_SYS_03 are inconsistently updated, affecting user account accuracy
